SurveySim package¶

class surveySim.survey(name='mySurvey', snTypes=['Ia', 'Ib', 'Ic', 'IIP'], zmin=0.1, zmax=1.5, dz=0.02)[source]¶

Bases: dict

A survey simulator class that allows you to find SN yields.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of your survey
  • snTypes (list (of str)) – A list of the supernova Types you want to find yields for
  • magLimits (list (of float)) – A list, corresponding to filters, of limiting magnitudes
  • mu (float) – Magnification parameter
  • zmin (float) – Minimum Redshift
  • zmax (float) – Maximum Redshift
  • dz (float) – Redshift stepsize
  • area (float) – Survey area (assumed square degrees)
  • filters (list (of str)) – List of filters corresponding to limiting magnitudes list
  • cadence (float) – Cadence of survey observations (assumed days)
  • surveyLength (float) – Length of survey (assumed years)
  • galaxies (astropy Table) – For a targeted survey, table containing galaxy data.
Returns:

None
plotHist(band, snClass, bound='Lower', facecolor='green', showPlot=True, savePlot=False)[source]¶

Plot a histogram of SN yields results.

Parameters:
  • band (str) – Filter you would like to plot.
  • snClass (str) – The SN class you would like to plot.
  • bound (str) – Plot the lower or upper bound (default lower)
  • showPlot (Boolean) – Show plot?
  • savePlot (Boolean) – Save plot?
Returns:

None
targetedSurvey(absolutes={'Ia': -19.25, 'Ic': -17.66, 'Ib': -17.45, 'IIP': -16.75}, Ia_av=0.3, CC_av=0.9, zpsys='ab')[source]¶

Run a targeted survey from a survey object.

Parameters:
  • absolutes (dict) – Dictionary containing absolute magnitudes for each SN class.
  • Ia_av (float) – A_v for Ia’s (Rodney et al.)
  • CC_av (float) – A_v for CC’s (Rodney et al.)
Returns:

None
unTargetedSurvey(absolutes={'Ia': -19.25, 'Ic': -17.66, 'Ib': -17.45, 'IIP': -16.75}, Ia_av=0.3, CC_av=0.9, zpsys='ab')[source]¶

Run an untargeted survey from a survey object.

Parameters:
  • absolutes (dict) – Dictionary containing absolute magnitudes for each SN class.
  • Ia_av (float) – A_v for Ia’s (Rodney et al.)
  • CC_av (float) – A_v for CC’s (Rodney et al.)
Returns:

None
